mita amatharawa, badulla, nuwaraeliya, mahanuwara saha mathale yana disthrikkayan hi janathawata, podu saha paudgalika depala, yatithala pahasukam, saha waga bim kerehi tharjanayakwa pawathina niyayam 47k sthayikaranaya kirime awashyathawa nayayam adhyayana saha sewa anshaya wisin handunagana athi athara pramukhathawaya matha thoragath nayayam sthayikaranaya sandaha awashya mulya pahasukam labaganima sambandhawa aapada kalamanakarana amathyanshaya ha jathika salasum departhamenthuwa samaga sakachcha pawathwe.

1999 awurudde (mata dinawakawanu nam mathakaye nomatha )ma saha ma sahruda bandarayange mulikathwayen amaradewa mastar palamu warata (baladharaya (aru mahatha ) wisin kapa harina ladi) ooman rajyaye maskat nagaraye bar al jisa palas rajakiya rangahale ohuge miyasiyen des wides rasikayan pinawu ayuruth, dina dahayak pura ma saha mage pawule ayath, yahalu yeheliyanuth samaga mastar gatha kala ee sonduru sadawanuth ma wetha nawatha gena eemata me sandawa aayeth samath una.

ohu 1820 di kolambaa sita mahanuwara dakwa margayak idi kirima aarambha karanawa.

pasugiya wasara paha athulatha motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwe liyapadinchi wahana sankhyawa laksha dahanawayaki.dinakata liyapadinchi wana wahana sankhyawa dedahasa ikmawa yamin thibe.wasara pahakata pera liyapadinchi wu wahana sankhawath, ada liyapadinchi wahana sankhyawath siyayata ekasiya wisihatharaka (124%) wadiwimak bawa motar ratha prawahana komasaris bi. si. el. dharmapi්raya mahatha prakasha karayi.thrasthawadi uwadura nathiwimath samanga me rate janathawage aadayam wadi wi rata thula wishala sanwardhanayak athiwimath, wahana aanayanaya sambandhawa thibu thiru badu adu kirimath nisa wadi pirisak wahanayak miladi ganimata pelambaima meyata hethu wi thibe.sama niwesakatama wahanayak labagatha haki aakaraye aadayamak labagatha haki paridi rate janathawage jiwana thaththwaya nangasituwima mahinda chinthanayen penwa di atha.janadhipathiwaraya balayata pathwi wasara hayak gathawana wita ema aramuna boho durata ishta kara athi bawa motar ratha prawahana departhamenthu wartha penwa deyi.danata pawathina warthawalata anuwa masakata wahana hathalisdahasak pamana liyapadinchi kere.2005 warshayedi dinakata liyapadinchi wu wahana sankhyawa 957 ki. 2007 di 1226, 2008 di 1082, 2009 di 836, 2010 di 1472 saha 2011 pasugiya masaya wana wita eya 2143 dakwa ihala gos thibe.me nawa wahana liyapadinchiya thulin motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa haraha rajayata labena aadayama koti panaha ikmawa yayi.kalayak thisse thrasthawadi grahanayata hirawi siti uthuru nangenahira janathawa wiwidha rakiyawala yedemin wishala washayen aadayam ipayimata patangena athi athara ema pradeshawala janathawagen da wahana sandaha wishala illumak labi thibe.boho wita dinakata motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwata liyapadinchi kirimata baraganimata nohaki tharam ayadumpath labe.wahana sel ayithikaruwan da prakasha kara sitinne me wana wita wahana sandaha tharagakari illumak pawathina bawayi..
